name: Hoop Masters
description:
Made for the Mix and Game Jam 2020 - Mixing Genres.

Play with a friend! Your aim is to get them to 0 health.

Player 1 controls:     Move: A and D    Jump: W / C     Attack: S / V

Player 2 controls:     Move: Left and Right arrows    Jump: up arrow / .    Attack: down arrow/  ,

Have Fun!

p.s. Sorry there's no WebGL version, i was in a rush to submit it before going to bed :(   There might be one later though...
